title: SAM-Based E-Learning Content Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical e-learning development process experiences using the SAM model for graduate students and working professionals.

learning_goals: By applying the SAM model’s three-stage (Prepare-Design-Develop) process, e-learning prototypes (Alpha/Beta/Gold) can be developed.
In iterative design phases, strategies for collecting learner feedback and improving content can be established.
In an LMS environment, a SAM-based development process can be applied to complete e-learning content on social themes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
